chart.title: Number of maternal deaths by region
chart.subtitle: Estimated number of deaths from [maternal conditions](#dod:maternal-mortality), by region.

Estimated maternal deaths.descriptionShort: The estimated number of maternal deaths in a given year.
Estimated maternal deaths.descriptionProcessing:
- The data shown is the UN MMEIG point estimate - this means there is a 50% chance that the true measure lies above this point,
  and a 50% chance that the true value lies below this point.
Estimated maternal deaths.citationShort: UN MMEIG (2023) – processed by Our World in Data
Estimated maternal deaths.citationLong: UN MMEIG (2023) – processed by Our World in Data. “Estimated maternal deaths” [dataset]. UN MMEIG (WHO, UNICEF, UNFPA, World Bank Group and UNDESA/ Population Division), “Trends in maternal mortality 2020” [original data].
